question:
Yusuf Adil Khan invited poets and artisans from which of the following countries?
1) Persia
2) Turkey
3) Rome
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Yusuf Adil Khan ruled the Adil Shahis of Bijapur from 1489 CE to 1510 CE. He was a highly cultured and an ardent follower of the Shia faith. He invited poets and artisans from Persia, Turkey, and Rome to his court.
